author: remm
msg: - The array allocated for the protocol was too big (the wrong constant was used).
Patch submitted by Martijn Koster <mak at greenhills.co.uk>

author: remm
msg: - JspCompiler shouldn't use a File here. Under Windows, it converts '/' to
'\\' which makes the URL connection class fail.

author: remm
msg: - Remove normalization of '\\' into '/'. That was a hack which was introduced
for Jasper, but conflicts with what DirCOntextURLConnection is doing.
